contentrichtext.text: [[Image:130 Romulus 25 mm ext.jpg|thumb|Valerius Romulus]] '''Valerius Romulus''', also '''Marcus Aurelius Romulus''' (c. 292/295 – 309) was the son of the [[Caesar (title)|Caesar]] and later [[roman usurper|usurper]] [[Maxentius]] and of [[Valeria Maximilla]], daughter of Emperor [[Galerius]]. [[Image:Appia-Massenzio-Romolo-001.JPG|thumb|left|Tomb of Romulus along the Via Appia.]] Valerius bore the title ''clarissimus puer'' in his youth, and later ''nobilissimus vir''. He was [[consul]] with his father in 308 and 309; the fact that Maxentius was the only consul for year 310 suggests that Valerius died in 309. He was buried in a tomb along the [[Via Appia]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://pleiades.stoa.org/places/916973546 |title=Places: 916973546 (Mausoleum of Romulus) |author=Becker, J. |accessdate=March 13, 2013 1:54 am |publisher=Pleiades}}</ref> After death, his status was [[Apotheosis|raised to Divus]] and his father dedicated the [[Temple of Divus Romulus]] to him along the [[Sacra Via]] near the [[Forum Romanum]]. {{s-start}} {{s-off}} {{s-bef | before= [[Maximian]] ,<br /> [[Constantine I]] ,<br />[[Flavius Valerius Severus]],<br />[[Maximinus II (Daia)|Maximinus Daia]],<br />[[Galerius]]}} {{s-ttl | title=[[List of Roman Consuls|Consul]] of the [[Roman Empire]] | years=308-309 |regent1= [[Maxentius]] ,<br />[[Diocletian]],<br />[[Galerius]],<br />[[Licinius]], <br />[[Constantine I]]}} {{s-aft | after= [[Tatius Andronicus]],<br /> [[Pompeius Probus]],<br />[[Maxentius]]}} {{end}} == References == * [http://www.roman-emperors.org/maxentiu.htm DiMaio, Michael, "Maxentius (306–312 A.D.)", ''De Imperatoribus Romanis''] == External links == {{Commons-inline|Valerius Romulus}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Romulus, Valerius | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 309 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Romulus, Valerius}} [[Category:290s births]] [[Category:309 deaths]] [[Category:Imperial Roman consuls]] [[Category:Constantinian dynasty]] [[Category:4th-century Romans]] [[Category:Deified people]]
